long_description: The Granite Gear Cayenne 30 Pack is big enough for daylong trips or ultralight overnights, but small enough that it won't interfere with your outdoor fun. Padded shoulder straps and hipbelt with pockets; sternum strap with whistle. Suspended mesh back panel helps you stay cool. Integrated frame and side compression straps support and stabilize your load. Lots of pockets keep you organized: dual bottle holsters; fleece-lined pocket; external zippered pockets. Hydration port and sleeve (reservoir sold separately). Trekking pole attachment. The Granite Gear Cayenne 30 Pack features a built-in raincover for sudden changes in weather. Closeout.
short_description: The Granite Gear Cayenne 30 Pack is big enough for daylong trips or ultralight overnights, but small enough that it won't interfere with your outdoor fun.
